title: [Whistler's Pass, Falls Landing]
description: Curtained by a steady flow of water from the falls, this landing provides a tranquil resting place.  Small lizards skitter across the rock occasionally.  Stray drops of water plop down onto the landing.  Moonlight filters through the falls.
